template.template: Template App Ceph by Zabbix Agent2
template.name: Template App Ceph by Zabbix Agent2
template.description:
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/410059-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-ceph
Template tooling version used: 0.38

item.name: Ceph: Minimum Mon release version
item.description: min_mon_release_name

trigger.name: Ceph: Minimum monitor release version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Ceph version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: Ceph: Number of Monitors
item.description: Number of Monitors configured in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph: Number of OSDs
item.description: Number of known storage daemons in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph: Number of OSDs in state: IN
item.description: Total number of participating storage daemons in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph: Number of OSDs in state: UP
item.description: Total number of online storage daemons in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in Temporary state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in pg_temp state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Pools
item.description: Total number of pools in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph: Ceph backfill full ratio
item.description: Backfill full ratio setting of Ceph cluster as configured on OSDMap

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD avg fill
item.description: Average fill of OSDs

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD max fill
item.description: Percentage fill of maximum filled OSD

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD min fill
item.description: Percentage fill of minimum filled OSD

item.name: Ceph: Ceph full ratio
item.description: Full ratio setting of Ceph cluster as configured on OSDMap

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD Apply latency Avg
item.description: Average apply latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD Apply latency Max
item.description: Maximum apply latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD Apply latency Min
item.description: Miniumum apply latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD Commit latency Avg
item.description: Average commit latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD Commit latency Max
item.description: Maximum commit latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD Commit latency Min
item.description: Minimum commit latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph: Ceph nearfull ratio
item.description: Near full ratio setting of Ceph cluster as configured on OSDMap

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD avg PGs
item.description: Average amount of PGs on OSDs

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD max PGs
item.description: Maximum amount of PGs on OSDs

item.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD min PGs
item.description: Minimum amount of PGs on OSDs

item.name: Ceph: Overall cluster status
item.description: Overall Ceph cluster status, eg 0 - HEALTH_OK, 1 - HEALTH_WARN or 2 - HEALTH_ERR

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in Active state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in active state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in backfill_toofull state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in backfill_toofull state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in backfill_wait state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in backfill_wait state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in Backfilling state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in backfilling state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in Clean state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in clean state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in degraded state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in degraded state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in inconsistent state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in inconsistent state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in Peering state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in peering state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in recovering state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in recovering state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in recovery_wait state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in recovery_wait state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in remapped state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in remapped state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in Scrubbing state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in scrubbing state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in Undersized state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in undersized state

item.name: Ceph: Number of Placement Groups in Unknown state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in unknown state

trigger.name: Ceph: Can not connect to cluster
trigger.description: Connection to Ceph RESTful module is broken (if there is any error presented including AUTH and configuration issues).

item.name: Ceph: Ceph Read bandwidth
item.description: Global read Bytes per second

item.name: Ceph: Ceph Read operations per sec
item.description: Global read operations per second

item.name: Ceph: Total bytes available
item.description: Total bytes available in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph: Total bytes
item.description: Total (RAW) capacity of Ceph cluster in bytes

item.name: Ceph: Total number of objects
item.description: Total number of objects in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph: Total bytes used
item.description: Total bytes used in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph: Ceph Write bandwidth
item.description: Global write Bytes per second

item.name: Ceph: Ceph Write operations per sec
item.description: Global write operations per second

trigger_prototype.name: Ceph: Ceph OSD osd.{#OSDNAME} is near full

dependency.name: Ceph: OSD osd.{#OSDNAME} is full
dependency.expression: {Template App Ceph by Zabbix Agent2:ceph.osd[{#OSDNAME},fill].min(15m)} > {Template App Ceph by Zabbix Agent2:ceph.osd_full_ratio.last()}*100

item_prototype.name: Ceph: [osd.{#OSDNAME}] OSD latency apply
item_prototype.description: Time taken to flush an update to disks.

item_prototype.name: Ceph: [osd.{#OSDNAME}] OSD latency commit
item_prototype.description: Time taken to commit an operation to the journal.

trigger_prototype.name: Ceph: OSD osd.{#OSDNAME} is down
trigger_prototype.description: OSD osd.{#OSDNAME} is marked "down" in the osdmap. The OSD daemon may have been stopped, or peer OSDs may be unable to reach the OSD over the network.

item.host: Template App Ceph by Zabbix Agent2
Template App Ceph by Zabbix Agent2

item_prototype.name: Ceph: [{#POOLNAME}] Max available
item_prototype.description: The maximum available space in the given pool.

item_prototype.name: Ceph: [{#POOLNAME}] Pool objects
item_prototype.description: Number of objects in the pool.

item_prototype.name: Ceph: [{#POOLNAME}] Pool Percent Used
item_prototype.description: Percentage of storage used per pool

item_prototype.name: Ceph: [{#POOLNAME}] Pool RAW Used
item_prototype.description: Bytes used in pool including copies made.
